sections.heading: Capstone Brief

sections.heading: Self-Assessment
sections.body: Checklist: **time-first** used? **placement+severity** clear? **results** concise? **repeat-back** included? **next step** explicit (follow-up or urgent handoff)? Note one strength + one target.
